sha_usurper.name: The Usurper
sha_usurper.overview: The shadow that believes power must be taken before it is taken from you. It fears being irrelevant, so it seizes control.
sha_usurper.integration: Turn control into leadership: ask, listen, delegate.
prompts: What am I afraid will happen if I do not control this?
Where can I share power and still be safe?

sha_martyr.name: The Martyr
sha_martyr.overview: The shadow that trades needs for moral superiority. It suffers loudly or silently, then resents the world for not noticing.
prompts: What do I need that I will not say out loud?
What boundary would end my resentment?

sha_heretic.name: The Heretic
sha_heretic.overview: The shadow that rejects belonging before it can be rejected. It attacks the system to avoid feeling small inside it.
sha_heretic.integration: Rebellion with purpose: critique, then build.
prompts: What am I protecting by refusing to belong?
Where could I contribute without losing myself?

sha_gilded_mask.name: The Gilded Mask
sha_gilded_mask.overview: The shadow that performs refinement to hide insecurity. It fears being ordinary, so it curates a persona instead of intimacy.
sha_gilded_mask.integration: Let one person see the unedited draft of you.
prompts: Who would I be if nobody were watching?
What truth am I disguising as taste?

sha_void_watcher.name: The Void-Watcher
sha_void_watcher.overview: The shadow that expects collapse. It scans for disaster to avoid being surprised by it.
sha_void_watcher.integration: Practice safe-enough and return to the present body.
prompts: What evidence exists that I am safe today?
What would I do if I trusted the next hour?

sha_ice_queen.name: The Ice Queen
sha_ice_queen.overview: The shadow that freezes to avoid heartbreak. It looks calm, but it is self-protection in a crown.
sha_ice_queen.integration: Warmth is not weakness. Choose one honest feeling per day.
prompts: What feeling am I refusing to name?
Where is it safe to soften 1%?

sha_fawner.name: The Fawner
sha_fawner.overview: The shadow that survives through approval. It adapts so much it forgets its own shape.
sha_fawner.integration: Trade approval for honesty, one sentence at a time.
prompts: What do I actually want?
What is a boundary I can say without explanation?

sha_hoarder.name: The Hoarder
sha_hoarder.overview: The shadow that stores resources, information, and love for later because it expects scarcity.
sha_hoarder.integration: Share strategically. Abundance grows through circulation.
prompts: What am I afraid to lose?
What could I give that would not endanger me?

sha_pyromaniac.name: The Pyromaniac
sha_pyromaniac.overview: The shadow that burns it all down when intimacy or responsibility feels too heavy.
sha_pyromaniac.integration: Pause before ignition. Choose repair over rupture.
prompts: What am I trying to escape?
What would staying look like for 24 hours?

sha_judge.name: The Judge
sha_judge.overview: The shadow that keeps the world clean by condemning it. It fears impurity, weakness, and being wrong.
sha_judge.integration: Hold standards with mercy. Correct without contempt.
prompts: What am I afraid will happen if I forgive?
Where can I practice firm but kind?

sha_wound_keeper.name: The Wound-Keeper
sha_wound_keeper.overview: The shadow that clings to pain for identity. It confuses memory with meaning and suffering with depth.
sha_wound_keeper.integration: Honor the wound, then release the throne it sits on.
prompts: What would healing cost me and what would it give me?
Who am I without this story?

sha_deceiver.name: The Deceiver
sha_deceiver.overview: The shadow that bends truth to secure safety. It lies not always to harm, but to survive.
sha_deceiver.integration: Practice honest simplicity. Truth is a nervous system reset.
prompts: What truth am I afraid will make me unsafe?
Where can I tell the truth and still be okay?
